projects.projectSummary: As a project manager and process owner at Conviva, I focused on improving the onboarding process to reduce new hire difficulties and minimize turnover. I collaborated with various teams, including Helpdesk, security, field tech, and EMR, to ensure a smooth implementation. By enhancing the process, my goal was to create a positive experience for new hires, increase satisfaction, and decrease turnover. Regular reporting to the business side highlighted the progress and positive impact on turnover rate.

Successfully led a team to a closely-won victory as the lead coder in a recent hackathon, showcasing exceptional technical acumen and strong leadership skills in delivering a responsive e-commerce website within the six-hour competition timeframe.
